Sentencas: Several cathode materials for solid oxide fuel cells with mixed electronic and ionic conductivity were applied to the feed-side electrode for steam and CO2 electrolysis; the feed-side electrode was exposed to a reducing atmosphere and carbon dioxide, and the feasibility of using a ceramic composite electrode without any metal catalysts was investigated.
Titulo: Compositional optimization of ceramic composite electrodes without metal catalysts for steam and CO2 electrolysis

Sentencas: Ceramic composite electrodes composed of La0.8Sr0.2FeO3(LSF), or La0.8Sr0.2MnO3(ISM) were fabricated using the infiltration method.
Titulo: Compositional optimization of ceramic composite electrodes without metal catalysts for steam and CO2 electrolysis

Sentencas: LSF showed good chemical stability but low electrical conductivity in co-electrolysis mode.
Titulo: Compositional optimization of ceramic composite electrodes without metal catalysts for steam and CO2 electrolysis

Sentencas: LSM showed a good electrical conductivity, but its chemical stability was poor in co-electrolysis mode.
Titulo: Compositional optimization of ceramic composite electrodes without metal catalysts for steam and CO2 electrolysis

Sentencas: Good chemical stability, high electrical conductivity, and good electrode performance could be obtained from a solid solution of LSF and LSM (La0.8Sr0.2Mn0.5Fe0.5O3, LSMF).
Titulo: Compositional optimization of ceramic composite electrodes without metal catalysts for steam and CO2 electrolysis

Sentencas: The electrode performance of LSMF was almost twice as good as that of La0.8Sr0.2Cr0.5Mn0.5O3 (LSCM).
Titulo: Compositional optimization of ceramic composite electrodes without metal catalysts for steam and CO2 electrolysis
